title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off - PSA 3
author: Gobucsmagic74

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off - PSA 3
posts.post_content: Offered is a T206 Cobb Bat Off - PSA 3 Piedmont 350 back. A very nice, clean card with great color and no creases. Asking $4475 overnighted via Paypal F/F. "I'll take it" trumps any on-going negotiations
